alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 8:27PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...LOCALLY DENSE FOG NEAR LAKE SUPERIOR... Locally dense fog was noted from Duluth and Superior east along the South Shore of Lake Superior to near Cornucopia as of 820 PM. Winds are expected to turn westerly and push the fog back out over the lake between 830 and 1030 PM. Some locations impacted by the dense fog include MN Highway 61 between Duluth and French River, I-35 between Midway and Thompson Hill to downtown Duluth, US Highway 2 between Superior and Maple, Highway 53 between Hawthorne and Superior, and WI Highway 13 between Parkland and Cornucopia, and WI Highway 35 between Superior and Pattison State Park. If traveling this evening, use caution. Use low-beam headlights, reduce your speed, and increase your following distance to allow more time to stop.
